INNER JOIN membership m ON p.membership_no = m.membership_no WHERE c.customer_id = #{customerId} ORDER BY createdate DESC LIMIT 0,1) n ON c.customer_no = n.customerNo WHERE c.customer_id = #{customerId} AND c.customer_pw = PASSWORD(#{customerPw}) AND c.customer_active = 'Y'
